Sphinx demo site
=====================

Pithos is a large container used by the ancient Greeks for bulk storage, primarily for fluids and grains. They're comparable to the drums, barrels, and casks of recent times.

.. toctree::
    :caption: Site pages
    :maxdepth: 1

    concept.md
    task.md

.. image:: _static/pithos.png
  :alt: Pithos
